summary: An email from an FBI agent (CID) to another FBI agent (NY) regarding the execution of a search warrant (SW) in the Epstein case, asking for an update on significant findings that might warrant a notification to the Strategic Command Network (SCN).

persons.name: Epstein
persons.context: The email subject line references Epstein, indicating the communication is about the investigation into him.

events.title: Search Warrant Execution
events.description: An FBI agent inquires about the execution of a search warrant (SW) that occurred on this date, seeking an update on any significant findings.

keyFacts: The FBI was actively executing search warrants in the Epstein investigation as of August 12, 2019.
The communication indicates coordination between FBI field offices (CID and NY) regarding the investigation.
Significant findings from the search warrant were to be reported to the Strategic Command Network (SCN).
